mapper.insert: INSERT INTO topics (id, content, authorID, createdAt, updatedAt, imgURLs) VALUES (#{id}, #{content}, #{authorID}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{imgURLs, typeHandler=cn.yiming1234.typehandler.JsonTypeHandler})
mapper.select:
select * from topics
and username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
order by createdAt desc
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM likes WHERE topic_id = #{topicId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (id, topic_id, user_id, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{topicId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS id, c.topic_id AS topicId, c.user_id AS userId, c.content, c.created_at AS createdAt, s.id AS "user.id", s.username AS "user.username", s.avatar AS "user.avatar" FROM comment c JOIN student s ON c.user_id = s.id WHERE c.topic_id = #{topicId}
